'''2.1.9618''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), '''2.1.9617''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.9616''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]) is a major update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on November 12, 2019, which fixed bugs.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-12484}} – Game switches to another account while starting the game
* {{bug|MCL-12415}} – Launcher does not remember preferred installation to launch
* {{bug|MCL-12341}} – Linux launcher is invisible on Wayland
* {{bug|MCL-12279}} – Launcher window is not created if using the beta launcher
* {{bug|MCL-12253}} – Excessive CPU usage and memory leaks
* {{bug|MCL-12212}} – Launcher overload in background
* {{bug|MCL-12191}} – Launcher not appearing
* {{bug|MCL-12075}} – Fresh install of launcher defaults to snapshots
* {{bug|MCL-11617}} – More Settings button only displays a gray panel
* {{bug|MCL-11270}} – Unable to login to launcher
* {{bug|MCL-11234}} – Unable to change profile's version in Linux
